title: Discharge Readiness Assessment
factors: Poorly controlled hypertension despite multiple medications
explanation: Patient presents high risk for readmission with LACE score of 11. Multiple concerns including uncontrolled hypertension, medication non-adherence, and cognitive decline require comprehensive discharge planning. Home health services and medication management support are essential. Consider involving family/caregivers in medication education and follow-up planning. Close outpatient follow-up within 3-5 days strongly recommended.
